title:
Dear People Who Have Recently Circled Me

I thought it only fair to issue a sort of warning.  I've looked...

attachments.displayName:
Dear People Who Have Recently Circled Me

I thought it only fair to issue a sort of warning.  I've looked at some of your profiles (those of you who have a profile) and I think it's a safe bet that several of you, at least, won't be wanting to follow me.

You see, I have outre friends, people with lots of opinions who like to talk about their opinions without falling into name calling and such, and we tend to talk in comments on my posts.  I post about things that, at least occasionally, offend certain people, especially people with particular conservative bends.  _It's not on purpose to offend._  These are just the things I think are worth talking about or laughing about or being outraged about, or are just interesting.

Here's a list of things you might find objectionable.

*Godzilla as a modern tragedy
*Godzilla as a rubber suit monster
*Sex toy review comics
*Sex, especially the kind that upsets people
*LIterary criticism, whether or not it involves sex (it seems to almost always involve sex somewhere).
*Books, although not necessarily books about sex
*Naked people, or nearly naked people, sometimes dancing
*Cats.  Lots of cats.
*Dogs, especially when they do doggie things.
*Being crazy.  No, like, really crazy. Personally.  Also, other people's crazy.
*Old movies.
*Science fiction.
*Not being Christian -- no, like really not Christian, but pagan, or sometimes atheist, or just anti-religious, or what Jesus really said.
*Fantasy, be it in books, movies, or in someone's mind.
*Sexual equality and the rights of minority groups.
*LGBTQI issues of all kinds.
*The uncomfortable truths I confront right where everyone can see.
*Cultural criticism, especially people who think everything used to be better in "the Old Days", because they usually have no frickin' clue about what was going on in "the Old Days".

And more stuff like that.  I rarely talk about sports unless it is to mock, or to state admiration of men in tight shorts.

Also, I am occasionally moved to use words that are considered "bad", although really that's just a cultural construct and words that actually have "bad" or negative meanings to them get bandied about quite freely with nary a thought about what's really being said, while so called "bad" words are really pretty innocuous or at most a bit disgusting, so fuck you.

So, really, if that's not going to suit you, feel free to uncircle me.  I won't be offended.  In fact, I probably won't even notice.

Sincerely,

Murphy

object.content:

annotation:
...shared, because...yeah, this kinda fits me...however I tend to post more Political and Culture postings cause...History and Anthropology interests me.

No doggies, however, as my current apt complex doesn't allow them....but yes, New Circlers who cannot read but one other posting ...do respond.  All other posts go to folks I have circled back..who get circled if/when they respond.

Pretty simple, eh?

object.content:
Well Hello there!

Welcome to the crew!

I think the only thing I ever tend to uncircle for is bigotry and yes too much gratuitous nudity. It all depends on context but I have wee ones and my comp is not in a private area. but I never think anyone should be responsible for that. That's my job :)...I ramble...and drink too much coffee. I agree with yer post :P

I tend to post - rarely of late, some of the choices out there are slim - are redheaded males in 'artistic photos'..which means you might see some male public hair hints, but nothing outright nude per se.  Suggestive...(and I tend to post to a certain circle only...some gents get disturbed..)

Last thing I am is a bigot...however I will joke that I am in a Modern Relationship..since I'm about as WASP and one can be, and married to a Gent who is pretty much my opposite! (and is nicknamed The Grimm One for various reasons!)

I drink too much tea.  I am also, according to The Grimm One....a bit of a Crusader...so I often side with the underdogs....of all kinds.  Tho not radically...

Seeing how you have Tina Vigilante circled..and it looks like you and I have a bit in common, welcome!
I also tend to defend underdogs even if I don't necessarily agree with them, I hate to see people picking on/ganging up on other people. Thx for the welcome.

I am a musician/singer/songwriter with my band but I make my living in IT. Music and art are my passion. I am Liberal in some ways, conservative in others, very rarely radical. Some say that I am an intellectual but I would never make that claim about myself.

Welcome to the Nuthouse Club!  Yeah, that's it...the...Secretly Intelligent and Wondering About The Rest of the Apes Out There Club!

Either way, welcome Mark!
...you'll be able to say way more of my postings than previously, Mark..
Thank you +Violante de Rojas . You've made my day :-)

title: Google+ List of Comments for an Activity
